task.name: hsd_blflag
task.shortdescription: Flag spectra based on predefined criteria of single dish pipeline
task.description:
Data are flagged based on several flagging rules. Available rules are: expected rms, calculated rms, and running mean of both pre-fit and post-fit spectra. Tsys flagging is also available.
In addition, the heuristics script creates many plots for each stage. Those plots are included in the weblog.
Output:
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.

param.name: iteration
param.shortdescription: Number of iteration to perform sigma clipping to calculate threshold
param.description: Number of iterations to perform sigma clipping to calculate threshold value of flagging.

param.name: edge
param.shortdescription: Number of edge channels to be excluded from statistic calculation to flag data
param.description:
Number of channels to be dropped from the edge. The value must be a list of integer with length of one or two. If list length is one, same number will be applied both side of the band.
example: [10,20], [10]

param.description: Activate (True) or deactivate (False) Tsys flag.

param.name: pipelinemode
param.shortdescription: The pipeline operating mode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In interactive mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: infiles
param.shortdescription: List of input files to be flagged (\'\'=all)
param.description: ASDM or MS files to be processed. This parameter behaves as data selection parameter. The name specified by infiles must be registered to context before you run hsd_blflag.

param.name: antenna
param.shortdescription: select data by antenna names or ids, e.g. \'PM03,PM04\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by antenna names or ids. example: 'PM03,PM04' '' (all antennas)

param.name: field
param.shortdescription: select data by field names or ids, e.g. \'M100,Sgr*\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by field names or ids. example: '*Sgr*,M100' '' (all fields)

param.name: spw
param.shortdescription: select data by spectral windows, e.g. \'3,5,7\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by spw ids. example: '3,4' (spw 3 and 4) '' (all spws)

param.name: pol
param.shortdescription: select data by polarizations, e.g. \'XX,YY\' (\'\'=all)
param.description: Data selection by polarizations. example: 'XX,YY' (correlation XX and YY) '' (all polarizations)
